member.name: F:Cavern.AudioListener3D.SampleRate
member.summary: Project sample rate (min. 44100). It's best to have all your audio clips in this sample rate for maximum performance.

member.name: F:Cavern.AudioListener3D.UpdateRate
member.summary: Update interval in audio samples (min. 16). Lower values mean better interpolation, but require more processing power.

member.summary: Maximum audio delay, defined in this FPS value. This is the minimum frame rate required to render continuous audio.

member.summary: Lower qualities increase performance for many sources.

member.name: P:Cavern.AudioListener3D.volume
member.summary: Alias for .

member.name: F:Cavern.AudioListener3D.Channels
member.summary: Output channel data. Set by the user and applied when an is created. The default setup is the standard 5.1 layout.

member.name: F:Cavern.AudioListener3D.EnvironmentType
member.summary: 3D environment type. Set by the user and applied when an is created.

member.name: F:Cavern.AudioListener3D.EnvironmentSize
member.summary: The single most important variable defining sound space in symmetric mode, the environment scaling. Originally set by the user and applied when an is created, however, overriding it in specific applications can make a huge difference. Objects inside a box this size are positioned inside the room, and defines the range of balance between left/right, front/rear, and top/bottom speakers. On asymmetric systems, this setting only affects channel volumes if environment compensation is enabled. The user's settings should be respected, thus this vector should be scaled, not completely overridden.

member.name: F:Cavern.AudioListener3D.EnvironmentCompensation
member.summary: Automatically set channel volumes based on and . Not recommended for calibrated systems. Set by the user and applied when an AudioListener3D is created.

member.name: T:Cavern.QualityModes
member.summary: Cavern processing quality levels.

member.name: F:Cavern.QualityModes.Low
member.summary:
Lowest quality: forced maximum performance by disabling some features.
Doppler effect and pitch shifting: No. Resampling quality: Low. Channels mixed to 3D space: First. Panning: Constant gain. Accurate angle calculation in asymmetric mode: No. Non-approximated 3D mix for Studio/Home in asymmetric mode: No.

member.name: F:Cavern.QualityModes.Medium
member.summary:
Medium quality: maximum performance with all features enabled.
Doppler effect and pitch shifting: Low quality. Resampling quality: Low. Channels mixed to 3D space: First. Panning: Constant gain. Accurate angle calculation in asymmetric mode: No. Non-approximated 3D mix for Studio/Home in asymmetric mode: No.

member.name: F:Cavern.QualityModes.High
member.summary:
High quality: maximum quality except for heavy features.
Doppler effect and pitch shifting: High quality. Resampling quality: High. Channels mixed to 3D space: All. Panning: Approximated constant power. Accurate angle calculation in asymmetric mode: Yes. Non-approximated 3D mix for Studio/Home in asymmetric mode: No.

member.name: F:Cavern.QualityModes.Perfect
member.summary:
Perfect quality: maximum quality for all features.
Doppler effect and pitch shifting: High quality. Resampling quality: High. Channels mixed to 3D space: All. Panning: Constant power. Accurate angle calculation in asymmetric mode: Yes. Non-approximated 3D mix for Studio/Home in asymmetric mode: Yes.

member.name: T:Cavern.Rolloffs
member.summary: Audio rolloff modes.

member.name: F:Cavern.Rolloffs.Logarithmic
member.summary: Logarithmic rolloff by distance.

member.name: F:Cavern.Rolloffs.Linear
member.summary: Linear rolloff in range.

member.name: F:Cavern.Rolloffs.Real
member.summary: Physically correct rolloff by distance.

member.name: F:Cavern.Rolloffs.Disabled
member.summary: No rolloff.

member.name: T:Cavern.Environments
member.summary: Environment type. Rendering method will be chosen by this and .

member.name: F:Cavern.Environments.Studio
member.summary:
For a single listener on the center with speakers placed around in a sphere.
Symmetric engine: balance-based.
Asymmetric engine: hybrid directional.

member.name: F:Cavern.Environments.Home
member.summary:
For a single listener or a few listeners close to each other on the center with speakers placed around in a cuboid.
Symmetric engine: balance-based.
Asymmetric engine: hybrid distance-based.

member.name: F:Cavern.Environments.Theatre
member.summary:
For many listeners. Viewers at the sides or the back of the room will also experience 3D audio, unlike in Studio or Home environments, but this will reduce the overall effect quality, even on the center.
Symmetric engine: balance-based.
Asymmetric engine: directional.
